div.class: flex flex-auto min-h-0 gap-2 items-stretch lg:container lg:mx-auto lg:max-w-6xl
h-full flex-1 min-h-0 min-w-96 flex flex-col items-stretch gap-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-300 dark:from-purple-900/50 to-40%

div.div:
<ItemController Ref="controller" db="<- db.This" itemId="{itemId}" />
<Connector data="<-controller.data" change="-> item" />
{item.name}
<DbLoadingIndicator isLoading="<-controller.isLoading" action="-> controller.doReload()" />
<Forma meta="{form}" metaId="{kind}" disabled="<-controller.isLoading" data="{item}" change="-> controller.onChange()" tabs="{R.itemForm.tabs}" groups="{R.itemForm.groups}" />
<ErrorMessage error="<-controller.error" class="truncate" If="<-controller.error" close="-> controller.error=false" />
<Btn icon="upload" title="Submit" mode="primary" action="-> controller.onSave()" busy="<-db.isUploading" disabled="<-controller.touched | not" />
